definitions.definition: A steroid hormone that stimulates development of male secondary sexual characteristics , produced mainly in the testes , but also in the ovaries and adrenal cortex .
Manly behavior, often of an aggressive or foolishly reckless nature.
examples: Mother encouraged James to rely more on intelligence and less on testosterone to deal with the neighbor's son.

main_definition: ( biochemistry , steroids ) A steroid hormone that stimulates development of male secondary sexual characteristics , produced mainly in the testes , but also in the ovaries and adrenal cortex .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Manly behavior, often of an aggressive or foolishly reckless nature.
